attributes.action: Ensure that British Football is shown on Terrestrial Television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is absurd that the British Public should have to subscribe to expensive Pay Per View Services just to watch their Country play football, monopolising the market. 

It is the Governments responsibility to ensure equal rights for all the people in this Country get to watch their Country play on Terrestrial Television without paying huge sums of money on top of the TV License.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
